NEWS




February 22, 2000

The Cult of Ast has been renamed "The Cult of The Dead" and the Temple of the Dark One has been renamed "Temple of The Old Ones".







February 19, 2000

This web site is under heavy construction & development and will not be fully opperational until the puplic release of ShadowBane.

However, a message board-Shadow Forum is up and the Cult of the Dead will be accepting members as soon as the initiation form is complete.
